name: PostToSlackWebHook
description: Posts a custom message to a slack web hook.
helpMarkDown: Posts a custom message to a [slack](https://www.slack.com) web hook.
author: Gio Palacino

inputs.name: SlackWebHookUrl
inputs.label: Slack Web Hook URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The web hook URL of the [slack app](https://slack.com/apps/manage) as which to post.

inputs.name: SlackCustomMessage
inputs.label: Custom Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: The [formatted custom message](https://api.slack.com/docs/messages/builder) to post to this web hook.

messages.NoWebHookUrl: No web hook URL to slack was provided.
